original_title: A Film of Their 1973 Spring Tour Commissioned by Christian World Liberation Front of Berkeley, California
overview: A radical Christian group's lecture tour of US colleges was filmed in the cinema verit√© tradition, with hand held camera, sync and wild sound. To avoid making a conventional documentary, the filmmaker created a dynamic collage by stroboscopically editing together pairs of scenes using a rapid rhythm of three-frame units.
title: A Film of Their 1973 Spring Tour Commissioned by Christian World Liberation Front of Berkeley, California
